store_info.description_short: A fully functional and minimal Portal app that can be used to quickly bootstrap a new app using Python.
description_long: A fully functional and minimal Portal app that can be used to quickly bootstrap a new app using Python.
See the Portal documentation to learn about how to fork and adapt it to your own needs: https://docs.getportal.org/app_template/
store_info.hint: This app is not meant to be used as anything else than a demonstrator.
